page.title: 09Holidays in Felixstowe
page.content: The part of Felixstowe around the Landguard-Langer area is one of the busiest parts of Felixstowe in the summer. At the{funfair}there are rides you can go on such as the Dodgems,the Big Wheel and the Roller Coaster.There are a few hotels,including the Marlborough Hotel and the{ Orwell Moat}House.Also there are three or four large caravan sites where people stay for their hol- idays.Lots of residents make their homes into bed and breakfasts. There are many things to do while staying in Felixstowe,like visiting places nearby,such as{Orford or {Framlingham castles. Some{disadvantages}of coming to Felixstowe are that the beach is shingle,and dirty and oily,the sea is filthy and the car parking is poor on weekends.
